ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups whole unskinned almonds, lightly toasted
1 large fresh egg white, at room temperature, lightly beaten, or more as needed

cookingTips: Toast almonds lightly to enhance flavor before processing
Add egg white gradually to reach desired consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on pulsing techniques in a food processor to achieve proper paste texture without over-processing.
